content:
Hi everyone,
I was having and issues with the add operation in HAPI, was not adding a new entry but was replacing it. Created a PR https://github.com/hapifhir/hapi-fhir/pull/3196 to fix it.
Can you please take a look?
thanks

@Ken Stevens can you please help me with this PR ?
thank you!

@James Agnew hi, any new about it ?
sorry for being so pushy guys
